name: Essence Mascara Lash Princess1000
description: The Essence Mascara Lash Princess is a popular mascara known for its volumizing and lengthening effects. Achieve dramatic lashes with this long-lasting and cruelty-free formula.

name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Water Gel
description: A lightweight gel moisturizer with hyaluronic acid to instantly quench dry skin. Oil-free and non-comedogenic.

name: Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Foundation
description: A foundation that mattifies and refines pores for a natural, seamless finish. Ideal for normal to oily skin.

name: NYX Professional Makeup Setting Spray
description: Lock in your makeup with this lightweight, long-lasting setting spray that provides a matte finish.

name: e.l.f. Poreless Putty Primer
description: A skin-perfecting primer that creates a smooth canvas and grips makeup for all-day wear.

name: CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser
description: A gentle foaming cleanser for normal to oily skin that cleanses without disrupting the skin's natural barrier.

name: The Ordinary Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1%
description: A high-strength vitamin and mineral formula to reduce the appearance of skin blemishes and congestion.

name: TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Shampoo
description: Infused with keratin and marula oil to fight frizz, detangle, and boost shine for sleek, salon-smooth hair.

name: L'Oréal Paris Voluminous Lash Paradise Mascara
description: Volumizing and lengthening mascara that delivers feathery-soft lashes with intense black pigment.

name: Revlon ColorStay Eyeliner
description: A waterproof, smudge-proof eyeliner that glides on smoothly for lasting definition.

name: Aveeno Daily Moisturizing Lotion
description: Clinically proven to improve the health of dry skin in one day, with soothing oat formula.

name: Batiste Dry Shampoo Original
description: Quickly refreshes hair without water, absorbs oil, and adds volume with a classic clean fragrance.

name: Milani Baked Blush - Luminoso
description: Highly pigmented blush with a luminous finish to brighten and highlight your cheeks.

name: Garnier Micellar Cleansing Water
description: All-in-one cleanser and makeup remover that’s gentle on skin yet tough on makeup.

name: Covergirl Clean Fresh Skin Milk
description: A nourishing, dewy-finish foundation made with coconut milk and aloe extract.

name: Physicians Formula Butter Bronzer
description: A creamy bronzer infused with Murumuru butter for a tropical glow and soft focus finish.

name: Real Techniques Miracle Complexion Sponge
description: A versatile makeup sponge designed to blend foundation seamlessly for a flawless finish.

name: Wet n Wild MegaGlo Highlighting Powder
description: Ultra-pearly highlighter that gives a radiant, lit-from-within glow at an unbeatable price.

name: Dove Beauty Bar Sensitive Skin
description: Fragrance-free bar soap specially formulated for sensitive skin. Moisturizing and gentle.

name: Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream
description: Anti-aging face moisturizer with hyaluronic acid and vitamin B3 for visibly firm, smooth skin.
